name: places/ChIJs_xsNJFZwokRhqdldztPi2U
formattedAddress: 103 Waverly Pl, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 103 Waverly Pl, New York, NY 10011-9110, USA

editorialSummary.text: Refined property with warmly decorated rooms, plus a restaurant, a lobby bar & Wi-Fi.

originalText.text: Small family run hotel. Not 4 star but perfectly fine for the price. Linens and towels great quality. Staff great. Bit of a deeper clean to the bathroom grouting for example would go a long way. Would stay again though.

text.text: Small family run hotel. Not 4 star but perfectly fine for the price. Linens and towels great quality. Staff great. Bit of a deeper clean to the bathroom grouting for example would go a long way. Would stay again though.

originalText.text:
I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. The service was great and the rooms were nice and clean as well. There is a gym on-site and they included slippers and robes in the closet. I'd definitely stay here again.

Service 10/10
Cleanliness 10/10
Ammenities 10/10
Appliances 8/10 (safe, iron, blow dryer but no micro/fridge)

text.text:
I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. The service was great and the rooms were nice and clean as well. There is a gym on-site and they included slippers and robes in the closet. I'd definitely stay here again.

Service 10/10
Cleanliness 10/10
Ammenities 10/10
Appliances 8/10 (safe, iron, blow dryer but no micro/fridge)

originalText.text:
Location! 10/10
Amenities 10/10

Tons of restaurants nearby, subway is two minutes away.

Bathroom has toiletries such as shampoo/conditioner/body wash etc.
Lots of towels! Fresh everyday!
Two sinks in quad room & Big and spacious
Shower has decent water pressure with hot water

Has:
blackout curtains
Fridge
Safe
Coffee bar w/decent coffee
TV
Storage for clothes

We stayed here for a week. Quad room was spacious enough for the 3 of us. Probably the biggest hotel room in NYC! We had a corner room on a lower floor with view of the street and park.
Unfortunately there was construction everyday starting at 0730 except Sat and Sun. I don’t recall being warned of this and it definitely impacted our stay. We were woken up to loud obnoxious street construction 5/6 days
All this being said, the cost of the hotel reflected this, as the room and location would have likely been double anywhere else.
The hotel is a solid 3 star hotel.
Bed is firm but not hard - I like a soft bed and this was not uncomfortable.
This is an old hotel family owned - if you’re expecting 5 stars for a 3 star price you would be disappointed.
I am very satisfied even with the construction issue we would hands down stay here again.

originalText.text: Our favorite place to stay in New York! Rooms are not large but perfectly fine and charming.  Old world charm and classic and the staff is fantastic.  Location couldn’t be better in the heart of the village.  And they haven’t raised their prices like so many places around them. Highly recommend!

text.text: Our favorite place to stay in New York! Rooms are not large but perfectly fine and charming.  Old world charm and classic and the staff is fantastic.  Location couldn’t be better in the heart of the village.  And they haven’t raised their prices like so many places around them. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Lovely hotel! Fabulous location. Friendly staff (The doorman is my favorite. Loved that he said “welcome home” every time I returned). Pricing seemed reasonable and better than other hotels. I would stay again!

text.text: Lovely hotel! Fabulous location. Friendly staff (The doorman is my favorite. Loved that he said “welcome home” every time I returned). Pricing seemed reasonable and better than other hotels. I would stay again!
